item.title: Hitori no Shita: The Outcast game The Hidden Ones launches in 2025 for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/hitori-no-shita-the-outcast-game-the-hidden-ones-launches-in-2025-for-pc-ios-and-android

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Pre-alpha test begins January 7, 2025.

The Hitori no Shita: The Outcast 3D action fighting game announced by Tencent Games subsidiary MoreFun Studios back in December 2022 is officially titled The Hidden Ones and will launch for PC via Steam, iOS, and Android in 2025, the developer announced. Users in the United States and Brazil can also apply now via the official website for an opportunity to participate in the pre-alpha test, which will begin on January 7, 2025.

“For years now, our team at MoreFun Studios has poured immense energy, dedication and passion into crafting The Hidden Ones to be a mythical martial arts experience that players across PC and mobile will love,” said MoreFun Studios head Enzo Zhang in a press release. “The development team at Morefun Studios is known across the globe for their wide portfolio of action and shooter games, and are thrilled to share The Hidden Ones with players who enjoy action-packed experiences.”

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

The Hidden Ones is a 3D action fighting game featuring a myth-inspired martial arts aesthetic.

Key Features

  • Captivating Outcast Stories and Fast-Paced Combat – Unveil the ancient myths of the Outcast world and engage in electrifying combat across diverse game modes.
  • Myth and Martial Arts Combined in Cinematic Design – Experience unique Eastern martial arts combat, featuring enticing cinematic scenes inspired by an urban myth with ancient elements.
  • Completely Fair Player-Versus-Player Experience – The core values of The Hidden Ones focus on ensuring fair competitive play and upholding a strict zero-tolerance policy against cheating.
  • ❮
  • ❯

Game Modes

  • Story Mode
    • Various boss mechanics and designs reflect the different chapters of the mythical martial arts story.
    • Experience cinematic-style cutscenes and beautifully-designed levels that immerse players in the action.
    • Venture into the world of The Outcast through action-packed battles and explore the story from multiple perspectives.
  • Duel Mode
    • Engage in high-intensity battles and adapt in the blink of an eye.
    • By integrating other characters’ skills into the action roulette, players can gain a game-changing advantage.
    • Use unique skills and strategies in a fair and competitive environment.
  • Trial Mode
    • Conquer all the epic bosses that emerge throughout the story mode.
    • Battle bosses that grow stronger with each fight, mastering different characters and battle styles to prevail.
